Line3.710B6: If I had been, if they had joined us, we could have been there to stop this tragedy.
Line1.710B6: So I’ve heard. Years ago, I spread word of Inarius and his teachings to the city’s rulers. They spurned me, but it was not their fault. I was not convincing.
MenuLabel: “The city of Guulrahn is overrun with cannibals.”
